response.name: read by using Value annotation
response.body:
{
    "readType": "Read by using @Value",
    "configValues": {
        "headerExcelColumn1": "TRANSACTION_ID",
        "headerExcelColumn2": "TRANSACTION_DATE",
        "headerCsvColumn1": "NAME",
        "name": "Test config",
        "uploadFileUrl": "D://app/fileupload",
        "smtpPort": "25",
        "emailAddress": "test@gmail.com",
        "emailPassword": "test",
        "phoneNoPrefix": "+959",
        "key": "userId",
        "columnListValues": [
            "No",
            "Name",
            "Amount"
        ],
        "defaultEmailRecipientList": [
            "yewin.mmr@gmail.com",
            "admin@gmail.com"
        ],
        "otherInternalEmailServiceUrl": "http://localhost:8081/sendEmail",
        "otherInternalBillServiceUrl": "http://localhost:8082/getBillers",
        "otherInternalIntegrationServiceUrl": "http://localhost:8083/integrationProcess",
        "otherInternalServiceSecret": "secretCode",
        "thirdPartyAACompanyClientId": "clientId",
        "thirdPartyAACompanySecretKey": "secretKey",
        "thirdPartyAACompanyGetDetailUrl": "http://aacompany host name or ip:port/getDetails",
        "thirdPartyAACompanyPostPaymentUrl": "http://aacompany host name or ip:port/doPayment",
        "thirdPartyBBCompanyUsername": "BB company provided username",
        "thirdPartyBBCompanyPassword": "BB company provided password",
        "thirdPartyBBCompanyPurchaseApiUrl": "http://bbcompany host name or ip:port/makePurchase",
        "thirdPartyGGMicrofinanceCompanyLoanUrl": "http://ip:port/loan",
        "thirdPartyOoredooOperatorEloadTopupUrl": "http://ip:port/topup",
        "thirdPartyTelenorOperatorPackageUrl": "http://ip:port/setPackage"
    }
}
